intro:
Celebrate the holiday season with Spot The Difference: Christmas Edition, brought to you by the original creators of the globally beloved Spot The Difference amusement machine game! Experience the festive thrill of head-to-head competition in an exciting two-player mode where you'll race to find all the differences first.

Immerse yourself in a winter wonderland, where the classic gameplay you love is wrapped in a holiday twist. Whether you're competing with a friend or racing against the clock in single-player mode, this edition will test your observation skills as you search for hidden details in cheerful Christmas scenes. Can you spot them all before time runs out?
